post: The sirens: They happen every First Monday. It's just a test. No need to panic.

comment.body: First monday of the month or??
So you need to invade Luxembourg on the first Monday of any month and no one would know?
it announces the beginning of the purge
That's what a traitor, supporting the Mars invasion, would say ;-)

Also today at 11AM, the loud "Ding Ding Ding" of the Gouvalert app announcing that it will no longer be used for alerts (replaced by the LU-Alert app).

However, they don't seem to bother removing it from the Google Play store.
